verbs.description: The Department of Homeland Security [V: is] drafting an order to end the child separation policy that 's become a political albatross for the Trump administration .
[ARG0: The Department of Homeland Security] is [V: drafting] [ARG1: an order to end the child separation policy that 's become a political albatross for the Trump administration] .
The Department of Homeland Security is drafting an order to [V: end] [ARG1: the child separation policy that 's become a political albatross for the Trump administration] .
The Department of Homeland Security is drafting an order to end the child separation policy that [V: 's] become a political albatross for the Trump administration .

The Department of Homeland Security is drafting an order to end [ARG1: the child separation policy] [R-ARG1: that] 's [V: become] [ARG2: a political albatross] [ARGM-GOL: for the Trump administration] .
